CustomField.description:
Please note that only HIVE Admins can populate Survey ID value.
Open a new "Validate survey" ticket with Survey ID and Campaign Information. Once the HIVE admins provide your survey settings, you will be able to create Tasks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Please note that only HIVE Admins can populate Survey ID value.
Open a new "Validate survey" ticket with Survey ID and Campaign Information. Once the HIVE admins provide your survey settings, you will be able to create Tasks.
CustomField.label: Survey ID
